string-array.name: attribution_descriptions
string-array.item:
https://github.com/jfeinstein10/SlidingMenu \n An Android library that allows you to easily create applications with slide-in menus. You may use it in your Android apps provided that you cite this project and include the license in your app. Thanks! Copyright 2012 Jeremy Feinstein
